main event: Reports of unidentified flying objects were documented in Granite City, Illinois, between January and November 1952.
interesting points: Reports included radar contacts with unidentified targets traveling at speeds of 1,000 to 1,200 miles per hour., Multiple instances involved military personnel observing and tracking these objects., One incident involved a 'target' disappearing from radar after displaying unusual maneuvers., Capt. Cornelis H. Boshoff submitted a report on unidentified aerial phenomena., There are indications that atmospheric conditions could have affected radar readings.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects and radar targets
witness description: Military personnel operating radar and observing the incidents.
